titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Property and Administrative Services Act to provide an opportunity for former owners to repurchase real property to be disposed by the United States.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S13282)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Governmental Affairs.

bill.summary: 10/7/1993--Introduced. Amends the Federal Property and Administrative Services Act of 1949 to provide an opportunity for individuals previously owning real property acquired by the United States by eminent domain to repurchase such property at fair market value if it is to be disposed of by the United States.
